entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chéticamp
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:13 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chéticamp 02:00 AM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.3°C
Wind: S 13 km/h gust 29 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 70 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 9 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 cm in the heaviest flurries. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 February 2023
